name: examgen
description: AI-powered exam question generator with React frontend and Express backend

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.docker:prod: BUILD_TARGET=production NODE_ENV=production ALLOWED_ORIGINS=http://localhost CLIENT_PORT=80 CLIENT_EXPOSE_PORT=80 START_CMD="node dist/server.js" docker-compose up -d
scripts.docker:prod:build: BUILD_TARGET=production NODE_ENV=production ALLOWED_ORIGINS=http://localhost CLIENT_PORT=80 CLIENT_EXPOSE_PORT=80 START_CMD="node dist/server.js" docker-compose up -d --build
